text: is a 1990 anime film directed by Yosei Maeda. == Voice Cast == *Katsumi Toriumi as Russ Clagg *Gorō Naya as Schott *Hiroshi Arikawa as Cal *Tomoko Munakata as Emily ==Release and reception== It was distributed theatrically in Japan by Toho on 28 April 1990. The film was released directly to home video by Columbia Pictures Home Video/Genesis as White Fang in 1994 in the United States. In Japan, White Wolf received the award for Best Animated Film at the Mainichi Film Concours. == References == ===Footnotes=== ===Sources=== * ==External links== * * Category:1990 anime films Category:Toho animated films Category:Japanese films Category:Group TAC
title: White Wolf (film)
